major_arcana.name: The Fool
major_arcana.upright: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit
major_arcana.lesson: Trust the journey and embrace new experiences with open heart
major_arcana.warning: Beware of naivety and impulsive decisions without consideration

major_arcana.name: The Magician
major_arcana.lesson: You have all the tools needed to create your reality
major_arcana.warning: Power without wisdom leads to manipulation and harm

major_arcana.name: The High Priestess
major_arcana.upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, subconscious
major_arcana.lesson: Listen to your inner wisdom and trust your intuitive knowing
major_arcana.warning: Ignoring intuition leads to poor decisions and disconnection

major_arcana.name: The Empress
major_arcana.reversed: Creative block, dependence on others, smothering
major_arcana.lesson: Nurture yourself and others; create beauty and abundance
major_arcana.warning: Overprotection and dependence stifle growth and creativity

major_arcana.name: The Emperor
major_arcana.lesson: Lead with wisdom and create stable foundations for growth
major_arcana.warning: Rigid control and domination destroy trust and creativity
